name: TrimType

properties.description: Trims away transparency at the edges of the image, leaving the smallest image containing nontransparent pixels.
properties.name: TRANSPARENT

properties.description: Removes from the image an area the color of the upper left pixel.
properties.name: TOPLEFT

properties.description: Removes from the image an area the color of the lower right pixel.
properties.name: BOTTOMRIGHT

description: The type of pixels to trim around an image.
